# NSFocusRingPlacement.above

**Case**

Draw the focus ring over an image.

## Declaration

```swift
case above
```

## Discussion

Fill a shape to add the focus ring around the shape.

## Constants

- **NSFocusRingPlacement.below**: Draw the focus ring under text.
- **NSFocusRingPlacement.only**: Draw the focus ring if you don’t have an image or text.
